question: Can a bachelor cannot call to any child e.g. his nephew, niece and other children son or daughter
answer:
QUESTION
Can a bachelor cannot call to any child e.g. his nephew, niece and other children son or daughter
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible for a person to call another persons child, son or
daughter. That is generally used as an expression of love.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
